avastAppDesc.description: max 132 chars are allowed for this message
avastAppDesc.message: Find the best prices, deals and coupons while shopping online with the price comparison and coupon extension powered by Avast.

avgAppDesc.description: max 132 chars are allowed for this message
avgAppDesc.message: Find the best prices, deals and coupons while shopping online with the price comparison and coupon extension powered by AVG.

sasStartingPrice.description: %s is the minimum value off the price. Example: Starting at: $124.00

spLoadingNotificationDescriptionMessage.message: It's worth the wait, we promise.

spOfferSaving.description: %s will be the saving percentage of the best offer. Ex: SAVE 25%

spSettingsPageCustomListTitle.message: Don’t show any notification on these websites:

spSettingsPageCustomListTitleDesc.message: (you can always see offers and coupons by clicking on the toolbar icon)

spSettingsPageHelpCouponsTitleDesc.message: To use a coupon, all you have to do is click it. If it reveals a code, you’ll need to paste it into the appropriate field during checkout. Otherwise, the coupon is automatically applied.

spSettingsPageHelpNotificationsTitleDesc.message: When SafePrice finds an offer or coupon related to your search, a notification will pop up. Click the big green button to see what we found for you.

spSettingsPageHelpOffersTitleDesc.message: Clicking on an offer will take you to a partner’s trusted online store, where you’ll get the new price listed on the notification.

spSettingsPageHelpOthersTitleDesc.message: Clicking on a listed special deal will take you to a partner’s trusted online store.

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsHide.message: Do not notify me about coupons

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsHideDes.message: (you can always see coupons by clicking on the toolbar icon)

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsShowAll.message: Show whenever a coupon is available

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsShowOnc.message: Show once on each website only

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersBetter.message: Only show when an offer better than the original price is available

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersBetterTh.message: Only show for offers with savings of at least  10  %

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersHideAll.message: Do not notify me about offers

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersHideAllD.message: (you can always see offers by clicking on the toolbar icon)

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersShowAll.message: Show whenever an offer is available

spSettingsTabNotificationsOthersDesc.message: Notify me about special deals for other categories (transportation, finance, power supply and more)
